name: part_010
file: tmp_【#沙花叉クロヱ3D】シャチ出没注意【ホロライブ】 [MOekZ-g5qJQ]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_010.mov

scenes.description: Sakamata Chloe plays a 'High and Low' card game at a casino table, losing a massive bet and expressing her frustration.
Sakamata Chloe announces the upcoming 3D debut of her generation mate, Hakui Koyori, while playfully teasing her character design.

subtitles.original: え？ちょっと待って、これ絶対…
subtitles.english: Eh? Wait a second, this is definitely...

subtitles.original: え？ちょっと待って。え、冷静になろう、大丈夫大丈夫。
subtitles.english: Eh? Wait. Let's stay calm, it's okay, it's okay.

subtitles.original: やだ！ずるいよ！ずるい！ねえ、坂又の…
subtitles.english: No! That's cheating! Cheating! Hey, Sakamata's...

subtitles.original: 坂又のチップ減った。悲しい。
subtitles.english: Sakamata's chips decreased. So sad.

subtitles.original: ねえ…ラ…ラスト？ラスト？
subtitles.english: Hey... last? Last?

subtitles.original: え…ちょっと…え、シンクロニズムどっち？
subtitles.english: Eh... wait... which one is "synchronism"?

subtitles.original: ちょっと、坂又に味方して？
subtitles.english: Wait, take Sakamata's side?

subtitles.original: え？勝ったら1000万枚だった。え、
subtitles.english: Eh? If I won, it was 10 million chips. Eh,

subtitles.original: スロットの万枚台2000台？あはははは！
subtitles.english: 2,000 slot machines with 10,000 chips each? Hahaha!

subtitles.original: やったー！これ絶対勝つよみんな、協力して協力して。
subtitles.english: Yay! We're definitely gonna win this, everyone, help me out.

subtitles.original: みんな、一緒に勝つよ、わかった？みんな、一緒に勝つよ。
subtitles.english: Everyone, let's win together, okay? Everyone, let's win together.

subtitles.original: ちょっと応援してね、どっちがいいか考えてね。
subtitles.english: Cheer for me, think about which one is better.

subtitles.original: じゃあ、マリンちゃんのターンどうぞ。
subtitles.english: Now, Marine-chan's turn, please.

subtitles.original: ラストだよ、ねえマジで。
subtitles.english: It's the last one, seriously.

subtitles.original: え、大丈夫だよね？大丈夫だよね？
subtitles.english: Eh, it'll be okay, right? It'll be okay, right?

subtitles.original: はい！はぁー！みんな！
subtitles.english: Yes! Haa! Everyone!

subtitles.original: え、みんなこれさ、圧倒的ローだよね？
subtitles.english: Eh, everyone, this is an overwhelming "low", right?

subtitles.original: え、圧倒的ローですよ！みんな、みんなどっちにする？
subtitles.english: Eh, it's an overwhelming "low"! Everyone, which one will you choose?

subtitles.original: どっちにするこれ？え、ローだよね？
subtitles.english: Which one for this? Eh, it's "low", right?

subtitles.original: え、もうみんなに聞くまでもないかこれ。どうどうどう？
subtitles.english: Eh, I guess I don't even need to ask. How is it?

subtitles.original: みんなどっちがいい？ローだよね？
subtitles.english: Everyone, which one do you want? It's "low", right?

subtitles.original: あ、ローだよね？そうだよね？
subtitles.english: Ah, it's "low", right? That's right?

subtitles.original: あーよかったよかったよかった。みんなと意見一致してた。よかった。
subtitles.english: Ah, good, good, good. My opinion matched everyone's. Good.

subtitles.original: え、何？なんか全額賭け…え、なんかすごい今ファイナルアンサー？
subtitles.english: Eh, what? Like, bet the whole amount? Eh, like "final answer" now?

subtitles.original: 全額賭けますか？って言われて、え…
subtitles.english: Being asked "Will you bet the whole amount?", eh...

subtitles.original: いやいやいや、全ベで。全ベでローで行きたいと思います。
subtitles.english: No no no, all bet. I'll go with all bet on "low".

subtitles.original: や、でもね、これで負けること絶対ないと思う。
subtitles.english: But you know, there's no way I'll lose this.

subtitles.original: え、行けるからね、まじで。え、待って、本当緊張してきた。
subtitles.english: Eh, I can do it, seriously. Eh, wait, I'm getting really nervous.

subtitles.original: 行けますよね？バイゾ。はい！
subtitles.english: I can do it, right? Baizo. Yes!

subtitles.original: …あああ！やだー！あああああ！やだやだ！
subtitles.english: ...Aaah! Nooo! Aaaaa! No, no!

subtitles.original: ねえやだ！どうしてなの？やめてやめて！
subtitles.english: Hey, no! Why? Stop it, stop it!

subtitles.original: やめて！え、え、坂又のチップ…
subtitles.english: Stop! Eh, eh, Sakamata's chips...

subtitles.original: あああ行かないで！行かないで！行かないで！
subtitles.english: Aaah, don't go! Don't go! Don't go!

subtitles.original: やだやだやだ！ここ、ここ痛い！
subtitles.english: No no no! Here, it hurts here!

subtitles.original: ここ、ここならまだ生きてるこの中！
subtitles.english: Here, it's still alive in here!

subtitles.original: この中、ねえ痛い！どうしてなの？
subtitles.english: In here, hey, it hurts! Why?

subtitles.original: やだやだやだ！俺、これ…あはははは！
subtitles.english: No no no! Me, this... hahaha!

subtitles.original: 坂又のチップもらえなかった…ねえひどい！
subtitles.english: I couldn't get Sakamata's chips... Hey, so cruel!

subtitles.original: ぴえぴえぴえぴえ、マリンちゃんに…ひどい！
subtitles.english: Pien pien pien pien, to Marine-chan... so cruel!

subtitles.original: 坂又勝ってたのに！何このゲーム！
subtitles.english: Even though Sakamata was winning! What is this game!

subtitles.original: もう水…いっぱい…え、なんで水渡されたの？
subtitles.english: Already, water... so much... eh, why was I given water?

subtitles.original: 黙れって？ねえひどい！ひどいよ！
subtitles.english: To shut up? Hey, so cruel! That's cruel!

subtitles.original: え、これで終わり？可哀想なんだが坂又。
subtitles.english: Eh, is this the end? Sakamata is so pitiful.
Haa... 2,000 chips? 20 million chips?

subtitles.original: はぁー…何枚くれるの？何枚くれるんだ？
subtitles.english: Haa... how many will you give me? How many will you give?

subtitles.original: え？これ…これがご褒美？
subtitles.english: Eh? This... this is the reward?

subtitles.original: きちゃめら…きちゃ…ちょっと…
subtitles.english: Kichamera... kicha... wait...

subtitles.original: きちゃめら…これがご褒美なの？
subtitles.english: Kichamera... is this the reward?

subtitles.original: ふざけるか！ふざけるか、あっち行け！
subtitles.english: Are you kidding me! Are you kidding, go away!

subtitles.original: やだ！坂又の勝ちを！お前のせいで！
subtitles.english: No! Sakamata's win! Because of you!

subtitles.original: うわあああああ！お前がいたから負けたんじゃないの？
subtitles.english: Uwaaaaa! Is it because you were here that I lost?

subtitles.original: ひどいよ！あんまりだ！ううう…
subtitles.english: So cruel! Too much! Uuu...

subtitles.original: ううう…なんで負けたの坂又。
subtitles.english: Uuu... why did Sakamata lose.

subtitles.original: ひどい。ひどいよ、あんまりだ。
subtitles.english: So cruel. So cruel, too much.

subtitles.original: 誰か助けて。誰か…誰か…
subtitles.english: Someone help me. Someone... someone...

subtitles.original: え、これだけなんですか？
subtitles.english: Eh, is this all?

subtitles.original: え、他に本当に何もないの？
subtitles.english: Eh, is there really nothing else?

subtitles.original: あ…分かりました。じゃあ…はい。
subtitles.english: Ah... I understand. Then... yes.

subtitles.original: こいつ、こいついるまんまなんだね。OK。はい。
subtitles.english: This guy, he's just gonna stay here. OK. Yes.

subtitles.original: はい、じゃあちょっと負け負けに負けちゃいましたが、
subtitles.english: Yes, well, I lost and lost big time, but...

subtitles.original: 坂又のかっこいいところをね、見てほしいなと思うので、
subtitles.english: I want you to see Sakamata's cool side.

subtitles.original: ここでちょっと気づいた人もいるんじゃないかな？
subtitles.english: Maybe some people have noticed?

subtitles.original: なんとライブステージがこの部屋にはあるんですね。
subtitles.english: There's actually a live stage in this room.

subtitles.original: そこで坂又、歌わせていただきたいと思います。
subtitles.english: So I, Sakamata, would like to sing there.

subtitles.original: どうどう？いいかな？いいかな？どう？
subtitles.english: How about it? Is it okay? Is it okay? How?

subtitles.original: こいつしかいないんで。ね、いいよ。
subtitles.english: Since there's only this guy. Right, it's okay.

subtitles.original: いや、お前のレスポンスは全然求めてない。はい。
subtitles.english: No, I'm not looking for your response at all. Yes.

subtitles.original: では行きたいと思います！レッツ・ゴー！
subtitles.english: Now, here I go! Let's go!

subtitles.original: はい、ここでお知らせです！6月16日木曜日20時から、
subtitles.english: Yes, here's an announcement! On Thursday, June 16th at 8:00 PM,

subtitles.original: 博衣こよりの3Dがお披露目されます！
subtitles.english: Hakui Koyori's 3D debut will be held!

subtitles.original: こんこよー！こんこよー、博衣こよりだよー！
subtitles.english: Konkoyo! Konkoyo, it's Hakui Koyori!

subtitles.original: あはは、ちょっと馬鹿にしすぎ。おへそがね、
subtitles.english: Hahaha, I'm making fun of her too much. Her belly button,

subtitles.original: めちゃくちゃエッチなのとお、
subtitles.english: is super sexy, and...

subtitles.original: あと実は今隠れているんですけど、足もね、素晴らしくエッチでした。
subtitles.english: Actually, it's hidden now, but her legs were also wonderfully sexy.

subtitles.original: そしてしっぽもね、みんなお待ちかね、お待たせしましたのしっぽもみんな…
subtitles.english: And her tail too, everyone's been waiting, sorry to keep you waiting, her tail also...
